english: The result was class warfare without ideological overtones on a grand and violent scale .
chinese: 结果是酿成了不带意识形态色彩的规模巨大而激烈的阶级斗争。

english: There will be class struggle while classes exist
chinese: 只要阶级存在，就有阶级斗争。

english: The class war raged as unions took on the government and business
chinese: 工会与政府、商界间的阶级斗争激烈。

english: However it is seemly members of a society , history is a history of class - struggle
chinese: 历史是阶级斗争的历史，而不管一个社会的成员如何看待它。

english: Marxism : putting people first - concurrently discussing the relationship between putting people first and class struggle
chinese: 兼谈以人为本与阶级斗争的关系
阶级斗争造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He bases his judgment on truman ' s use of " the vocabulary of class warfare " in his 1948 campaign
chinese: 他的判断是基于杜鲁门在1948年竞选中所使用的“阶级斗争词汇” 。

english: These four factors acted coordinately and made the errors of mocc develop as endless vicious circle
chinese: 这四个因素有机联系、综合发挥作用，使阶级斗争扩大化的错误恶性循环、不断发展。

english: This was a time of sharp class struggle in this area , leading up to the initiation , and i was very actively involved
chinese: 那时候这个地区的阶级斗争十分尖锐，直至人民战争的发动，我非常积极地参加了斗争。

english: He argued that while the labour party " does not recognise the class struggle , the class struggle will certainly recognise the labour party "
chinese: 他认为虽然工党"不认可阶级斗争，阶级斗争将一定认可工党" 。

english: Thus there is identity in the united front between unity and independence and between the national struggle and the class struggle
chinese: 这样便把统一战线中的统一性和独立性、民族斗争和阶级斗争，一致起来了。

english: It appears that the ancient people lived in atrocious environment . they watched out for other ' s attack even smoking
chinese: 看来古人生存的环境是够恶劣,抽烟的时候还的提防点别人算计,提高警惕,千万不要忘记阶级斗争

english: The second part of the thesis has made a longitudinal survey of the developing process of mocc from the aspect both of theory and practice
chinese: 文章第二部分从理论和实践的角度对阶级斗争扩大化的历史演变进程进行了纵向梳理。
